title: Best of The Program | 2/11/20
description:
Today is the New Hampshire Democratic primary, and a new Quinnipiac poll ranks Bernie Sanders as the front-runner. However, New Hampshire libertarians say they’ll vote for Bernie just so he can lose to Trump. The economic “mood of the nation” is the highest Gallup has ever recorded as we switch from Obama’s “jobs saved” to Trump’s “jobs created.” And Glenn’s new book, “Arguing with Socialists,” is available for preorder as the nation faces a critical decision over socialism.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

content:encoded:
Today is the New Hampshire Democratic primary, and a new Quinnipiac poll ranks Bernie Sanders as the front-runner. However, New Hampshire libertarians say they’ll vote for Bernie just so he can lose to Trump. The economic “mood of the nation” is the highest Gallup has ever recorded as we switch from Obama’s “jobs saved” to Trump’s “jobs created.” And Glenn’s new book, “Arguing with Socialists,” is available for preorder as the nation faces a critical decision over socialism.
